White_Plains.Mamaroneck Methodist Church: Mamaroneck United Methodist Church is a historic Methodist church located at 546 East Boston Post Road in Mamaroneck, Westchester County, New York. It was built in 1859 and is a one story, Gothic Revival style building of wood frame construction with a gable roof. It is rectangular in form with a rear, two story, transecting wing built in 1869.
